alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 5:25PM EDT until April 24 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fowlerville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oak Grove around 535 PM EDT. Cohoctah around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Parkers Corners, Conway Township, Tyrone Township and Deerfield Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
